title: Sans serif condensed font
content:
[http://www.designforfun.com/images/portfolio/holdsteady\_01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091015014528/http:/www.designforfun.com/images/portfolio/holdsteady_01.jpg "http://www.designforfun.com/images/portfolio/holdsteady\_01.jpg")

This font is so familiar, but i cant for the life of me remember it? any thoughts? (both the red main fon tand the thinner highlight..)

author: beek

comments.content: of course its H&FJ.. thank you
